data.title: Elizabeth Saydah
data.meta_description: Voice Talent Elizabeth Saydah speaks English (United States) and voices Commercials, Web-Videos, eLearning/Explainer/Audio Guides, Corporate Narration/Presentations, Documentaries, Podcasts, Telephone prompts/IVR, Audio Books, Video Games/Apps, Cartoons, Dubbing/ADR, Front of Camera, other; The voice you need... delivered yesterday.
data.text:
With over 15 years of experience in the VO industry, experience runs the gamut. From the conventional to the bizarre, I've done it all.

Thousands of commercial, explainer, promo, corporate, eLearning, IVR, audiobook, film, animation, and videogame projects to date

I specialize in tech, healthcare and company explainers; auto, healthcare and hospitality eLearnings, and character work for commercials.

You've recently heard me in spots for Disney+, Aetna, Indeed, Skechers, Google, Geico, Hyundai, Del Taco, and the American Heart Association; as the radio imaging voice of Sirius XM's Lithium channel (34); and in the hit games, Oxenfree 2 (Riley), The Evil Within 2, Wasteland 3 and Brawl Stars (Piper).

I've voiced loads of product promos, explainers, corporate content, and live event voiceovers as well, and strive not only to make your project as easy as possible, but truly GREAT.

Training

University of Chicago, B.A. w/ Honors - Humanities/Theater and Performance Studies

The Sanford Meisner Center for the Performing Arts (two-year conservatory)

Second City Chicago/The Improv Space/Upright Citizens Brigade (private coaching)

Private voice coaching/workshops: David Lawrence (LA)

ADR/looping: Johnny Gidcomb (LA)

Killian's Commercial Workshop (LA)

And above all... LIFE.

Clients include:

Specials

Lightning fast turnarounds, pristine audio, flexible directed session availability, exceptional directability and improv skills, the ability to transition from character to character seamlessly.
